>
> Upon hearing about Yoketron, Straight Shot freezes.  Her expressions c=
hange dramatically, as she turns to Leo Prime.
> 
> " Dinobot - knew all th=
at time, that Master Yoketron was killed?  Why didn't anyone tell us?  Does=
 anyone else know?  Has anyone even told Nightshift and Tucson?  I'd like t=
a see Dinobot gather the courage ta tell Tucson in person what his comrade =
did ta our Sensai! "
> 
> Quickstride turns to Dinobot in shock.
> 
> " I k=
now you preds are bad news, but wow, that really tips the scales, literally=
."
> 
> Rattrap also gasps.
> 
> " AND YOU THOUGHT WHAT I DID WAS BAD?!  HA=
H, THAT WAS JUST PAYBACK FOR WHAT YOUR COMRADE DID TA THE GREATEST NINJABOT=
 MASTER OF ALL TIME! IF I HAD KNOWN THAT I WOULD NEVER HAVE ADMITTED TA MY =
MISTAKE!  OHHH ARE YOU IN SERIOUS SCRAP NOW BUDDY!  JUST WAIT UNTIL TUCSON =
IS NOTIFIED OF THIS! Then again... Ohh boy, Leo, I - think you better be th=
e one ta tell 'em...  Master Yoketron was everything ta him, this is gonna =
really do serious damage ta his emotional circuitry."
> 

There was a hooti=
ng, mocking laugh from DINOBOT, "You do not know what COURAGE is, little Ma=
ximals.  I am more than fine to instruct you in it."

Grinning then, still =
in ihs TRANSMETAL mode, "You forget we are at WAR.  On this planet, buildin=
g on CYBERTRON.  You treat this as games.  It is not a game, little SCRAPLE=
TS.  We are fighting for our future.  You toss out these wordes without any=
 understanding of what they are.  Your sensei died for his lack of capabili=
ties in combat, ashis better won in the fight."

GRINNING madly at them in =
his tyrannosaurus mode, "And you play at this.  You do not understand what =
it is.  You think it is fun and games.  But perhaps in time you wil lsee wh=
at the true nature of war is.  When the Predacons crush you under our armor=
ed boots!  Predacons, TRANSFORM AND RISE UP."

Readying then to begin their=
 search patrol over of the area with HYDRAS signal.
